title: The Greatest Rivalry: India vs Pakistan
overview: There is nothing like cricket to raise emotions in India. But passion hits new heights when it's a match between India and Pakistan! The Greatest Rivalry - India vs Pakistan chronicles the relationship between both countries, on and off-field. The docu-series is filled with emotions, cricketing action and humor as it presents two sides of a coin - the competitiveness and unlikely camaraderie shared between the two teams. Featuring legends like Sunil Gavaskar, Virender Sehwag, Shoaib Akhtar, Ravi Ashwin, Inzamam-ul-Haq, Saurav Ganguly, and many others - dive into the greatest rivalry known to any cricket fan.
